SklearnModel

Parent class based on BaseModel for all models with a sklearn-like API to share functionalities.
class model._sklearn_model.SklearnModel(task, optuna_trial, encoding=None, n_outputs=1)¶

Bases: model._base_model.BaseModel, abc.ABC

Parent class based on BaseModel for all models with a sklearn-like API to share functionalities. See BaseModel for more information.
